definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, primarily used as a feminine given name, most famously associated with Agatha Christie, the renowned British mystery writer.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，主要用作女性的名字，最著名的是与英国著名侦探小说作家阿加莎·克里斯蒂相关联。
definitions.example_en: Agatha Christie wrote over 66 detective novels and 14 short story collections.
definitions.example_cn: 阿加莎·克里斯蒂创作了60多部侦探小说和14部短篇小说集。
